strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Commando is a wildcard on the battlefield, capable of turning any situation to his favor.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Single Tap can be used to deal with foes at any distance. Combine it with Blade of Cessation up close to shred foes.

< ! > Gouge is a powerful debuff that can critical hit and activate item effects, on top of heavy damage.

< ! > Proper balance of melee and ranged combat is key, and Tactical Roll grants high armor to help enter and exit battles.

< ! > Disrupt enemies with Submission, whether it be to aid in an escape or get the jump on an unsuspecting target.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, newfound sense of humanity within.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he returned, humanity lost without a trace.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_LORE:
He lays to rest by a fire, setting the weapons he carries within an arm's reach. Checking his surroundings, hoping the cave he hid in would be enough shelter. Some would say, it isn't wise to be overly cautious. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>they haven't seen enough.</color>

The service pistol he got when he enlisted. Well used, dirtied, and loved. It's brought him through thick and thin, no matter which mission he took on. Some would say, only a fool would trust their weapon. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>your weapon is all you can trust.</color>

The blade of a fallen brother of war. Picked from what he could scavenge of the last of humanity he's seen. Some would say, it keeps their spirits united. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>it's to keep their spirits from joining for as long as possible.</color>

The loads of cargo that landed with him. Each item picked from a chest, keeping him alive in one way or another. Dozens of shipments to anyone but him. Some would say, they aren't his to take. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>if he doesn't take them, then no one will.</color>

The glow of a violet light coming from deeper within the cave. Calming, warming... beckoning. Welcoming him deeper and deeper, promising safety. Some would say, what sounds too good to be true usually is. He would say, <color=#FFCCED>Faust was a wise man.</color>
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_GOUGE2: <style=cKeywordName>Gouge</style><style=cSub>Applies 200% damage over time. Capable of critical hits and activating item effects.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_PRIMARY_BLADE_DESCRIPTIO: <style=cIsDamage>Gouging</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. Slice enemies in front for <style=cIsDamage>160% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_SECONDARY_CONCUSSION_DES: <style=cIsDamage>Gouging</style>. Fire a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style> sword beam for <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_SECONDARY_BEAM_DESCRIPTI: <style=cIsDamage>Gouging</style>. Fire a <style=cIsDamage>piercing</style> sword beam for <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_UTILITY_DODGE_DESCRIPTIO: <style=cIsUtility>Roll</style> a short distance, temporarily gaining <style=cIsUtility>200 armor</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_UTILITY_TAUNT_DESCRIPTIO: <style=cIsHealth>Taunt</style> nearby enemies, decreasing their <style=cIsDamage>armor</style> but increasing their <style=cIsDamage>damage</style>. Can be held to stack the effect up to <style=cIsDamage>3</style> times.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_SPECIAL_SUBMISSION_DESCR: <style=cIsDamage>Stunning</style>. Fire repeatedly for <style=cIsDamage>6x80% damage</style> per shot. The number of shots increases with attack speed.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_SPECIAL_BOSS_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Gouging</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Charge up</style>, then <style=cIsUtility>dash forward</style> and unleash a devastating series of slashes for <style=cIsDamage>{1}% damage</style> per slash. The number of slashes increases with attack speed and charge duration.
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_SPECIAL_SCEPSUBMISSION_D:
<style=cIsUtility>Agile.</style> <style=cDeath>Rending.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Charge up</style>, then fire a barrage of up to <style=cIsDamage>6 blasts of 4x70%.</style>. <style=cIsUtility>The number of shots increases with attack speed</style>. 
<color=#d299ff>SCEPTER: Additionally fires up to {0} lasers which deal {2}% damage.</color>
strings.SS2_NEMCOMMANDO_SPECIAL_SCEPBOSS_DESCRIP:
<style=cIsDamage>Gouging.</style> <style=cIsUtility>Charge up</style>, then <style=cIsUtility>dash forward</style> and unleash a devastating barrage of up to <style=cIsDamage>{0} slashes</style> that deal up to <style=cIsDamage>{1}% damage each</style>. <style=cIsUtility>The number of slashes increases with attack speed</style>. 
<color=#d299ff>SCEPTER: At full charge, briefly vanish, then unleash all of your strikes at once.</color>
